description:
Nekome-cho is overrun by Shades, forcing Subaru and Itsuki to fight their way through as they make their way toward the Gaia Tower to shut down the energy signal emanating from it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Sake of the World, We Will Defeat You!
Sekai no Tame ni, Anata o Taoshimasu!
世界のために, あなたを倒します!
